price: Ja sam, uistinu, Allah, drugog boga osim Mene nema; pa Meni ibadet čini i kad god Me se sjetiš, namaz obavi!
arabic: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innanī anā al-lahu lā ilāha illā anā fa-uʿ'bud'nī wa-aqimi al-ṣalata lidhik'rī
